description: Reaction video covering Episodes 304, 305, and 306, focusing on the Luffy vs Lucci fight and the Gear Third debut.

author: Unknown
description: Reaction video covering episodes 301, 302, and 304, highlighting the Gear 3 debut and Sogeking's role.

title: One Piece: 10 Facts Everyone Should Know About Gear Third
author: Rei Penber
description: An in-depth article covering 10 essential facts about Luffy's Gear Third technique, including its debut during the Enies Lobby arc, mechanics, power level, and evolution after the timeskip.

title: Luffy's Best Gear 3 Moments in One Piece, Ranked
author: Suzail Ahmad
description: A ranked list of Luffy's most memorable Gear Third moments throughout the series, starting with its introduction during the fight with Rob Lucci in the Enies Lobby arc.

title: All Of Luffy's Gears in One Piece, Ranked By Strength
author: Suzail Ahmad
description: Comprehensive ranking of all of Luffy's Gear techniques by strength, including analysis of Gear Third's power level and how it compares to other forms.

title: All of Luffy's Gear Forms in One Piece, Explained
author: Timothy Donohoo
description: Detailed explanation of all of Luffy's Gear forms including the mechanics of Gear Third's bone inflation technique and its evolution over the series.

title: 304: "I Can't Protect Anyone Unless I Win! Third Gear Activated!"
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A first-time viewer's reaction and analysis of Episode 304, discussing the strategic battle between Luffy and Lucci and Robin's PTSD triggered by the Buster Call.

title: One Piece Episode 304 Discussion
author: Various
description: Fan discussion thread from when Episode 304 originally aired, with fans commenting on the animation quality of Gear Third and excitement about the new technique.

title: When does Luffy use Gear 3?
author: Sportskeeda Staff
description: Informational article detailing when Luffy first uses Gear 3 in both the manga (Chapter 421) and anime (Episode 304) during the Enies Lobby arc.

title: One Piece: Luffy's 10 Best Gear Third Techniques, Ranked
author: Game Rant Staff
description: Ranking of Luffy's best Gear Third techniques throughout the series, including the original Gigant Pistol that debuted in Episode 304.
